parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.18

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets a value to a given stat. <br>
A list of possible StatNames can be found here: [[Arma 3 Stat Names]]<br>
Its important to note that most Stats are restricted to scripts and missions in certain paths.<br>
For example "ExpWarlockDown" is restricted to scripts in any subdirectory of <tt>"a3\Missions_F_Exp\Campaign\Missions\"</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[setStatValue]] [name, value]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [name, value]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setStatValue]] ["ExpWarlockDown", 1]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Unlocks the "Warlock Down" Steam achivement</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getStatValue]], [[Arma 3 Stat Names]]
</value></part></template></root>
